Author: toastedfingies
Text: Thank you! Drinking more water is almost always what gets rid of whatever ickiness I feel hehe

Author: fragmentsofmyself
Text: Drink lots of water to help flush the excess sodium that would otherwise make you retain water and you should be okay :)  I always log my binges too because it helps me realize that if I’ve gained 2lbs the next morning that it’s literally impossible to be fat gained because my binges are always under maintenance.
